entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
